comments:
Hello All,

Sorry for the question but I really need your help. I need to run Report Viewer in Weblogic 8.1 for the printing and csv conversion utilities. I get below error  while opening the report of Web Viewer Example in Report Viewer in Weblogic.

Weblogic 8.1 contains jdk142_08. Their BEA_JAVA_HOME is jrockit81sp5_142_08. BIRT uses JDK1.5.x. I guess that the JDK version might be the problem.

Thank you very much in advance.
Did you install Report Viewer in weblogic 8.1 correctly? When deployed it, no any errors? It seems that the ViewerAttributeBean from request is null.Could you please give us more information? Thanks.

As such it does not gives me any kind of errors but while deploying the Web Veiwer Example I get below mentioned warning.

<HTTP> <: Public ID references the old version of the Servlet DTD. You must change the public ID in web.xml file to "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Applicaiton 2.3 EN".

I can definitely run the index.jsp of the Web Viewer Example but not the report.

In short when I run the report in frameset (Web Viewer) mode it gives me that error and not in run (HTML) mode where it works properly.
Which version of Birt Viewer did you use? Please change the first line from 2.2 to 2.3 in web.xml and try it again. Thanks.

I was using the viewer with version 2.0.1. But I downloaded the newer one with version 2.1.0 and it works though. I can run the viewer, get the pdf and can get the csv also through the browser. Thank you very much for your support.
